text: Guyana competed at the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, West Germany. Three competitors, all men, took part in four events in two sports. ==Boxing== Men's Light Middleweight (- 71 kg) *Reginald Ford :* First Round -- Bye :* Second Round -- Lost to Alan Minter (GBR), KO-2 ==Cycling== One cyclist represented Guyana in 1972. ;Sprint * Neville Hunte ;1000m time trial * Neville Hunte :* Final -- 1:10.48 (→ 22nd place) ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports Category:Nations at the 1972 Summer Olympics 1972 Summer Olympics Category:1972 in Guyana
title: Guyana at the 1972 Summer Olympics
